languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Ничего. Если бы мне приснилась Вультур, я бы тоже изрешетил{mf||а} всю комнату".
[Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Ничего. Если бы мне приснилась Вультур, я бы тоже изрешетил{mf||а} всю комнату".

traits.locale_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."
[Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

[Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamed about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."
[Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamed about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

languages.text: [Sourire] « Ne vous inquiétez pas. Si j'avais rêvé de Vultur, j'aurais moi aussi criblé cette pièce de balles. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « Ne vous inquiétez pas. Si j'avais rêvé de Vultur, j'aurais moi aussi criblé cette pièce de balles. »

languages.text: [微笑む]「心配いらない。もしヴァルターの夢なんか見ていたら、{mf|俺|私}だってこの部屋を銃弾だらけにしていたさ」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「心配いらない。もしヴァルターの夢なんか見ていたら、{mf|俺|私}だってこの部屋を銃弾だらけにしていたさ」

languages.text: [Sonreír] «No pasa nada. Si yo soñara con Vultur, también llenaría la sala de balas».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «No pasa nada. Si yo soñara con Vultur, también llenaría la sala de balas».

languages.text: [微笑]“不用介意。要是我梦到了沃尔图尔，我恐怕也会把整个房间打得千疮百孔。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [微笑]“不用介意。要是我梦到了沃尔图尔，我恐怕也会把整个房间打得千疮百孔。”

languages.text: [Gülümse] "Özür dileyecek bir şey yok. Vultur rüyama girse ben de tüm odayı delik deşik ederdim."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [Gülümse] "Özür dileyecek bir şey yok. Vultur rüyama girse ben de tüm odayı delik deşik ederdim."

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Kein Grund zur Sorge. Hätte ich von Vultur geträumt, hätte ich wohl auch wild um mich geschossen."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Nothing to worry about. If I'd dreamt about Vultur, I'd have riddled the whole room with bullets, too."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Kein Grund zur Sorge. Hätte ich von Vultur geträumt, hätte ich wohl auch wild um mich geschossen."
